title: Was Fiasco "new cola " just a clever marketing trick?
subtitle: It is almost inconceivable that a company the size and scope of Coca-Cola could make a mistake on the scale of what it did in 1985.
author: Snopes Staff
vclaim: Coca-Cola stopped producing its main drinks in 1985 and introduced a new coke in its place as a marketing trick to combat the decline in market share and re-inflame interest in the original drink.
